column3: NACK.\nPlease take upstream to Transiflex. Check the translation_process.md doc.\n

Why not changing this over transflex...

@jonasschnelli 0.10 has been forked off, and translations for each major release are separate, so for anything merged into master there will be enough time to translate before 0.11 (after translations for 0.11 are opened).\n
